Paradoxine...Where and How?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Expeditions: Torles: Paradoxine...Where and How?
By Doxine on Sunday, May 14, 2000 - 04:28 pm:

Exactly where do you find the paradoxine? I've
posted it here since in some MR2 sites, they say paradoxines are found in the Torles Mountain expedition, others say nothing at all in their maps ('cept for disks and other items, but not paradoxines). Where is it in the Torles Mountain map?

Is there another factor in intelligence (or other stats) or rank to consider before this item can be found in the Torles expedition? I've kept sending a very intelligent monster in this expedition and kept going into the central cave (that's what they say) but alas!, I can't find any paradoxine item 'cept for disk chips and mint leaves. :(

By Kurasu Soratubo on Tuesday, May 16, 2000 - 03:58 pm:

It's a rare item to find, as far as I can tell. I've found it twice on one trip, and had a heck of a time finding it since then. Try reloading an intelligent creature and check it out a few times. I'm _positive_ that's where I ended up finding my Paradoxine.
